full_text:
Fwd: Media inquiry - TMZ - seeking autopsy results of Jeffrey Epstein
From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
To: Lee Plourde
Date: 2019/08/16 17:41
Subject: Fwd: Media inquiry - TMZ - seeking autopsy results of Jeffrey Epstein
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Lee, please review and advise.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
-------- Original message --------
From: BOP-IPP/Public Affairs <BOP-IPP/PublicAffairs@bop.gov>
Date: 8/16/19 5:34 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Cc: Nancy Ayers (b)(6) @bop.gov
Subject: Media inquiry - TMZ - seeking autopsy results of Jeffrey Epstein
>>> "BOP-IPP/Public Affairs" 08/16/2019 17:35 >>>
(b)(5)
Office of Public Affairs
Information, Policy and Public Affairs Division
Federal Bureau of Prisons
(202) 514-6551 - phone
(202) 514-6620 - fax
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @tmz.com 8/16/2019 5:05 PM >>>
Do you have the results of his autopsy?

additional_notes: The document appears to be a redacted email chain regarding a media inquiry from TMZ about the autopsy results of Jeffrey Epstein. The email contains redactions marked as (b)(5), (b)(6), and (b)(7)(C). The document is likely a government document due to the presence of a document number and the involvement of the Federal Bureau of Prisons.
